synopsis.text:
King, Hawk, and the rest of the Seven Deadly Sins take center stage in this riveting anime special, revealing the untold stories of their past and the formation of their unbreakable bonds. As Hawk cleverly employs Merlin's magical artifacts in a battle against Howzer, Princess Veronica tirelessly hones her skills under Guila's guidance. Meanwhile, King finds solace in the Fairy King's Forest before reuniting with his fellow Sins for a well-deserved beach vacation.

This OVA, bundled with the 34th volume of the manga, presents a collection of captivating tales. Witness an epic culinary showdown in "A Fight!! The Captain Knight of Food Scraps," delve into the emotional depths of "Naked Heart," be enthralled by the intriguing tale of "Harlequin and Helbram," and join the Sins for some fun in the sun in "The Sins Vacation." Prepare for a rollercoaster of emotions and action in this extraordinary journey with the Seven Deadly Sins!
